body.p: Dear Sir- You will confer a favor on me by handing the letter ^of Reasor & Judge Johnston^ with my former petition to Gov Bramlett, and ask his early attention to the same. Execution has been issued and it is important the matter Should be attended to immediately. Please let me hear from you immediately as early as convenient Reasor is the City Atty. and Johnson is the Judge and I think the case clear enoughf. If the forfeiture is remitted be kind enoughf to send the order of remission to me-

W. B. Hoke
firm of English & Hoke

Mr E. L. Van Winkle
Sec of State
Frankfort
Ky.
